segments.text: Ah , yes , hello . I'm calling to get some info about your PIN services . You see , my friend also has an account with you and also enjoys shopping on the Internet . She recommended I sign up for this service too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That was a wise decision , if I may say so . Our Personal Internet Banking Service offers online shopping transactions , payment of household bills online , account management ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will probably just use it for online shopping . At the moment , I have to meet the seller in person and pay cash , if it's a local seller .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This will fix all of that for you . If you use our online payment service , the money will come straight out of your account and go directly into the seller's account , in a secure way .
segments.speaker: S1
